name: Ghost With a Sick Nasty Shotgun
name_original: Ghost With a Sick Nasty Shotgun
description:
Made for Mini Jam 117: Ghosts.

Had a lot of fun with this jam, I learnt a lot, and made a game I'm proud of! I'll probably participate next time, so watch out for that.

Overview.

The title's a little long, but you gotta do what you gotta do to get the point across. Anyway, you play as a little ghost, with a shotgun. There's a few evil ghosts that you gotta kill, so good luck. You get upgrades as you level up, there's only 5 choices, so choose wisely. You'll probably need to do a run or two to figure out what works best. There's also four augments you can enable before your run, each doing different things, you can hover over them to get their name, that should tell you what they do...

(Sorry if it runs like trash i'm not good at optimization i promise im not mining bitcoin)

Controls.

WASD or IJKL to move

Shift/Space/M2 to dash

Click to shoot

That's it.

Credits.

Retrodead for the music and the awesome wipe transition

Rein for allowing me to use "him"

The rest of the Mini Jam discord for giving me feedback :)

You for playing the game!

Thank you all so much! :D
